title: Analysis of graph: parametric functions part - b

content.description:
Consider the curve given by the parametric equations

x = 2t3 − 3t2  and  y= t3 − 12t
content.question: Write an equation for the line tangent to the curve at the point where <math> <mrow> <mi> t </mi> <mo> = </mo> <mo> − </mo> <mn> 1 </mn> </mrow> </math> .

frqParts.text: Write an equation for the line tangent to the curve at the point where <math> <mrow> <mi> t </mi> <mo> = </mo> <mo> − </mo> <mn> 1 </mn> </mrow> </math> .

topic.text: 2.2: Defining the Derivative of a Function and Using Derivative Notation

skill.text: Skill 1.D: Identify an appropriate mathematical rule or procedure based on the relationship between concepts (e.g., rate of change and accumulation) or processes (e.g., differentiation and its inverse process, anti-differentiation) to solve problems.
